title: Flashdance
tags: 1997 ChiptuneCover cover diskmag Remake YM Z80 ZXSpectrum
info:
Soundtrack from "#Z80" ZX Spectrum E-paper Issue #03 by [group]796[/group], Condor Soft [CDS] & [group]792[/group]. 

Original song "Flashdance... What a feeling" by Irene Cara from her album "What a Feeling'" and soundtrack of "Flashdance" movie.
